translations: n.马克杯；杯子（mug 的复数）
v.向……行凶抢劫；给……拍照；扮鬼脸（mug 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: She sloshed coffee into the mugs.
sentences.translation: 她哗哗地把咖啡倒进杯子里。

sentences.sentence: He spooned instant coffee into two of the mugs.
sentences.translation: 他用勺把速溶咖啡舀进了两个杯子里。

sentences.sentence: She emptied both their mugs and switched on the electric kettle.
sentences.translation: 她倒空了他们俩的杯子，然后打开了电水壶。
